divs: Sighting DetailsAs I was pulling out of my neibhor hood I turned my head to the south to check for oncoming traffic, then I saw the fastes moving object I have ever seen. Starting around 80,000 feet (best Guess) then at aprox 7,000 feet it stoped abruptly like somthing caught it. I was first thinking that I was watching a shooting star but I soon changed my mind by the color and direction of travel. I am still not sure of what I saw but I will tell you I have seen many shooting stars as I do alot of camping and I have worked the Early morning shift for 18 years. The only reason I am reporting this is the feeling I get when the event comes back in my mind I get a feeling of peace , terestial sort of feeling....
Summary: a fast moving object blue and white in color
